# Identity users' role/job

In pseudocode, we can think of a process as:

```
sandyTweetsIn_sf$users <- sandyTweetsIn_sf$u_description %>%
  remove puntuation %>% 
  convert to lowercase %>% 
  filter and detect certain keywords
  
sandyTweets_experts <- select tweets containing those keywords
  
```
